name: Randoom (Elia Oliosi, Pandikorn, Andrl, JamesShroud)
description:
Randoom: Causality vs Casuality

Enter the non deterministic world of Randoom:Casuality vs Causality and become Albert Pebble as he tries to restore the order of the universe. Summon wondrous weapons with the power of the artifact which can enforce limited causality through casuality in a world of pure chaos: the mighty Everdice.

Features

Slaughter your way through endless hordes of enemies in your quest to restore causality to the universe, Randoom Guy. 

Frantic horde-like, platform-like 2D shooter. Challenge the casuality of the Everdice, which determines the weapon you can use to face hordes of enemies. Manipulate the dice’s face to choose your weapon but beware, the enemies can roll the dice too! 

Authors

Elia Oliosi - Lead Developer - Programmer

Andrl - Shotgun Developer, Main Soundtrack & Effect Googler

Pandikorn - 3D/2D artist

JamesShroud - Moral Support, Most Weapon Designer, Credits Generator.
